name: Frozen Hearts
summary:
Sophie has been frozen inside a crystal for two centuries. When the ice thaws, she wakes up in an unfamiliar world. Everything is frozen, including the people of the palace in which she finds herself. When she makes her way to the nearby village, people’s shocked reactions surprise her too - they call her a Hero. Legend says she sacrificed herself two centuries ago to end a terrible war, freezing the leaders of both factions along with the rest of the world.

But is that tale all there is to the story?

What roles did Richard the Ice King and Ivan the Rebel Leader really play in Sophie’s life?

What will they do now that they have escaped their icy prison too?

Can Sophie reverse the permanent winter, or will the world be thrown into a final, destructive conflict that freezes the future forever?
